  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```{r setup}
install_cmdstan(cores = 4)
```

```{r setup}
library(bisonR)
```

```{r}
data("binary_ex1")
df <- binary_ex1
head(df)
```

```{r}
fit_edge <- edge_model((event | 1) ~ dyad(node_1, node_2), data=df, data_type="binary", mc_cores=4, verbose=TRUE)
```

```{r}
plot_trace(fit_edge)
```

```{r}
summary(fit_edge)
```

```{r}
plot_network(fit_edge, lwd=2)
```

```{r}
plot_predictions(fit_edge, num_draws=20)
```
